Delete Rule: Are you sure you want to do this?
Kural sil: Bu işlemi yapmak istediğinizden emin misiniz?

Delete Rule: Conditions (don't add conditions if rule is applied to all products)
Kural sil: Koşullar (tüm ürünler için kural uygulanıyorsa şartlar ekleme)

Delete Rule: We found updated rules that are not applied. Please click "Apply Rules" to update your catalog.
Kural sil: Uygulanmayan güncel kuralları bulduk. Kataloğunuzu güncellemek için lütfen "Kuralları Uygula" yı tıklayın.

Delete Rule: We can't delete this rule right now. Please review the log and try again.
Kural sil: Bu kural şu ​​an silinemiyor. Lütfen günlüğü gözden geçirin ve tekrar deneyin.

Delete Rule: We can't find a rule to delete.
Something went wrong while saving the rule data. Please review the error log.
Kural sil: Kaydederken bir şeyler ters gitti. Lütfen hata günlüğünü gözden geçirin.

Delete Rule: Rule with specified ID "%1" not found.
Could not rebuild index for empty products array
Kural sil: Boş ürün dizinleri için dizin yeniden oluşturulamadı

Delete Rule: We can't rebuild the index for an undefined product.
Kural sil: Dizini tanımlanmamış bir ürün için yeniden oluşturamayız.

Delete Rule: Catalog rule indexing failed. See details in exception log.
Kural sil: Katalog kuralı dizini oluşturulamadı. Detaylara istisna günlüğünden bakabilirsiniz.

Delete Rule: Percentage discount should be between 0 and 100.
Discount value should be 0 or greater.
Kural sil: İndirim değeri 0 ya da daha büyük olmalıdır.

Delete Rule: Adjust final price to this percentage
Adjust final price to discount value
You disabled %1 Catalog Price Rules based on "%2" attribute.
Kural sil: "%2" özelliğini baz alarak Katalog Fiyat Kurallarını %1 devre dışı bıraktınız.

Delete Rule: Undefined SQL operator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2
Kural sil: Undefined SQL operator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2

Delete Rule: Undefined rule operator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2
Kural sil: Undefined rule operator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2

Delete Rule: Undefined rule aggregator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2
Kural sil: Undefined rule aggregator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2

Delete Rule: The "%1" rule was unable to be saved. Please try again.
Kural sil: The "%1" rule was unable to be saved. Please try again.

Delete Rule: The rule with the "%1" ID wasn't found. Verify the ID and try again.
Kural sil: The rule with the "%1" ID wasn't found. Verify the ID and try again.
